job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for architecture design and maintenance of Next Generation Distributed Storage, including distributed block storage, object storage, file storage etc.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the design and maintenance of a storage platform, which is a form of software infrastructure development and integration, aligning with building robust systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure the architecture to meet SDS (Software Defined Storage) scenarios, HCI scenarios and hybrid cloud scenarios.
job_tasks.justification: This involves designing and ensuring the compatibility of the storage architecture with various defined scenarios, which falls under the integration and development of software-defined infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for the development of Reference Architectures and technology standards based on Infrastructure Building Blocks, that can be offered as services to our internal customers
job_tasks.justification: Developing reference architectures and standards for infrastructure services is a core software development and integration task, focusing on creating reusable and service-oriented components.

job_tasks.phrase: Demonstrate a high level of technical expertise to support complex Storage & Backup devices, including SAN, NAS and Backup solutions across all tiers, under minimal supervision
job_tasks.justification: Supporting and managing complex storage devices and solutions, while requiring technical expertise, is part of the broader software and infrastructure integration and maintenance lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for the design, implementation, security and availability of Storage, Backups and SAN infrastructure, based on business requirements while adhering to tight operations, security, and procedural models
job_tasks.justification: This encompasses the full lifecycle of designing, implementing, and ensuring the security and availability of infrastructure, which is a key aspect of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Operate in complex, highly-secure, highly-available, operations-centric datacenter environments and interact with other technology domain experts as required, to build and maintain the Storage and Backups solutions in those datacenter environments
job_tasks.justification: Operating within datacenter environments and building/maintaining solutions involves significant integration and development work, requiring collaboration with other experts.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for complex provisioning, advanced maintenance, data replication, disaster recovery, data migration and documentation for our Storage and Backup environments
job_tasks.justification: These tasks, including provisioning, maintenance, replication, disaster recovery, and migration, are all integral parts of managing and developing robust infrastructure systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Write technical design and build documentation for storage infrastructure
job_tasks.justification: Creating technical documentation for infrastructure is a standard part of the software development and integration process.

job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for technology strategy, engineering standards, methodologies, task-plans and best practices for Storage Engineering.
job_tasks.justification: Defining technology strategy, standards, and best practices for engineering is a high-level software development and integration task, shaping the direction of the infrastructure.

soft_skills.phrase: work with various engineering, devops and product management teams
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions working with different teams, indicating a need for collaboration and communication.

soft_skills.phrase: interact with other technology domain experts as required
soft_skills.justification: This highlights the necessity of interacting and communicating with other technical specialists.

soft_skills.phrase: Demonstrate a high level of technical expertise to support complex Storage & Backup devices
soft_skills.justification: Supporting complex devices requires problem-solving skills and technical expertise, implying a pragmatic approach to resolving issues.

soft_skills.phrase: Responsible for architecture design and maintenance of Next Generation Distributed Storage
soft_skills.justification: Taking responsibility for the architecture and maintenance of a next-generation system implies ownership and a drive for innovation.

soft_skills.phrase: Responsible for the design, implementation, security and availability of Storage, Backups and SAN infrastructure
soft_skills.justification: Being responsible for the design, implementation, security, and availability of critical infrastructure demonstrates ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: Responsible for technology strategy, engineering standards, methodologies, task-plans and best practices for Storage Engineering.
soft_skills.justification: Taking responsibility for the overall technology strategy and best practices indicates a high degree of ownership and a proactive approach.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on the design, implementation, maintenance, and operation of storage infrastructure, including distributed block, object, and file storage, SAN, and backup solutions. All identified tasks fall under 'Macro-Category A: Core Software Engineering', specifically '1.A.1. Software Development & Integration'. There are no mentions of AI/ML models, generative AI, prompt engineering, or related specialized tasks. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer'.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the responsibilities, which are all related to storage infrastructure engineering. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward.
